definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="68" y="-22"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_simple_block"><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:DragonBallLootchest</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">1000</field><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate this feature twice in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">1</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally.
